'''The Shrine of Shouki no Kami''' is a [[Quest Domain]] during the {{Quest|Where the Boat of Consciousness Lies}}.

==Walkthrough==
# Defeat the first phase of the Everlasting Lord of Arcane Wisdom
# Begin to fight the second phase of the Everlasting Lord of Arcane Wisdom
#* When the Everlasting Lord of Arcane Wisdom initiates his Cosmic Bombardment attack, the battle will be interrupted by a cutscene. The battle continues after the cutscene ends.
# Defeat the second phase of the Everlasting Lord of Arcane Wisdom

==Gameplay Notes==
* After the cutscene, the active character will recover '''5%''' of their Max [[HP]] every 2 seconds.
